scripts.copiarGramatica: echo ========administrando Archivos XML======== && npx rimraf dist/Gramatica/Quetzal.js && copyfiles Quetzal.js dist/Gramatica && npx rimraf Quetzal.js && echo ========finaliza administrador XML========
scripts.correrGramatica: npm run gramatica && npm run copiarGramatica
scripts.full-build: echo ========Full Build======== && npm run build && npm run correrGramatica && echo ========Finalizado========
